subtask1.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the turn detection

subtask2.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the knowledge selection
subtask2.desc: Ensembled 2 model variations trained on 3 different data splits (total 6). We selected the knowledge snippets with unanimous predictions from the models.

subtask3.ensemble: No, only a single model was used for the response generation
subtask3.desc: The T5 model generates individual responses for each review, which are then combined by instructGPT.
